Vampire_Amulet.NAME: Vampire Amulet
Vampire_Amulet.FLAVOR: A mysterious amulet that seems to draw in life force.

Phylactery.NAME: Phylactery
Phylactery.FLAVOR: A gem that holds the soul of its creator, turning that mage into a lich.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per combat, if you would die: Heal to 10% of your max. HP instead.
